level.text: The Department shall submit to the Mayor the following reports:
The YES status summary including participant characteristics as of July 30, and August 30, 1980 components (e.g., Vocational Exploration Program (VEP) shall be included in this report); and
The YES Financial Status Report as of July and August 30, (Special/Component Financial Reports shall be included).
Reports in this section shall be submitted to the Mayor no later than fifteen (15) days after the end of the report period.
